description: Catalog Administrator is responsible for all rights related to the upkeep, configuration and customization of a data catalog. Can also assign/remove roles
description.en: Catalog Administrator is responsible for all rights related to the upkeep, configuration and customization of a data catalog. Can also assign/remove roles

description: Data Owner is responsible for accuracy, integrity, and timeliness of a data asset and for establishing the controls for its generation, lifecycle management, and access.
description.en: Data Owner is responsible for accuracy, integrity, and timeliness of a data asset and for establishing the controls for its generation, lifecycle management, and access.

description: Data Steward is responsible for data content, context and rules, working with various stakeholders. May create/enhance/approve metadata/datasets, respond to questions/issues and grant access to datasets.
description.en: Data Steward is responsible for data content, context and rules, working with various stakeholders. May create/enhance/approve metadata/datasets, respond to questions/issues and grant access to datasets.

description: Data Consumer consumes the data and also has contributor rights to give ratings, suggest new business terms, make comments and ask questions, create datasets.
description.en: Data Consumer consumes the data and also has contributor rights to give ratings, suggest new business terms, make comments and ask questions, create datasets.

description: Data Custodian implements process, working with Data Steward; enables the user community to access and manipulate (use) the data. It is a technical role and often resides in the IT department.
description.en: Data Custodian implements process, working with Data Steward; enables the user community to access and manipulate (use) the data. It is a technical role and often resides in the IT department.

description: Guest User has limited privileges and can rate, comment and suggest tags
description.en: Guest User has limited privileges and can rate, comment and suggest tags

description: System Administrator has all the rights and is responsible for the upkeep, configuration, customization, security, and reliable operation of the system
description.en: System Administrator has all the rights and is responsible for the upkeep, configuration, customization, security, and reliable operation of the system

description: Users in this role can not access catalogs
description.en: Users in this role can not access catalogs
